title: Why is Azir getting gutted again?
body:
In competitive he either does poorly and loses and or isnt picked/banned.

Why is this champion supposedly so broken he needs to get nerfed?

Ban rate = perceived imbalance from competitive which is false.

replies.body:
I think he can survive these nerfs but.... There are bigger problems in competitive.
Like.. Lissandra! Gnar! Lee Sin! Jarvan IV!

Or they can buff things up so they can fight the current meta. At this point I would not mind seeing some small buffs to those who are too weak honestly.
Like Nautilus, Anivia, Amumu, Sona, Ashe, Brand etc.
Yeah it's a longer list than those who are strong but... I don't know the benchmark where they may be nerfing too much.

He is strong right now but there isn't a huge amount to choose from.
Just roll with the Master Tactician and you'll be fine against Lissandra. If you know what you're doing. {{champion:50}} too stronk against lane bullies.
